attributes.action: stop proposals to divert TV Licence funds towards regional and children's output on ITV and Channel 4.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With every household having an average of £300 from their annual shopping bill being used for television advertisements, I believe it is morally wrong of Lord Carter to recommend diverting TV Licence funds to help ITV and Channel 4 produce their regional news and children's programmes.

Regardless of the current economic climate, it is principly wrong to have the public pay ITV and Channel 4 twice through the fee and rising shopping bill costs to pay for advertisments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
